comments:
I performed a Replace With Branch or Version after cancelling a previous one 
and got an exception ("Resources could not be deleted"). The dialog did not 
have any details that said what resources could not be deleted. The 
CVSException#wrapException() method copies the info from the core status but 
not the children. It should copy the childen as well.

Exception in modal context operation:
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSException: Problem deleting resource: 
Problems encountered while deleting resources.
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSException.wrapException
(CVSException.java:67)

(EclipseFile.java:57)
	at
